title: 84/49/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 January 1984 authorizing the French Republic to introduce intra- Community surveillance in respect of imports of certain slippers and other indoor footwear and certain beach slippers originating in the People's Republic of China (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 17 January 1984
authorizing the French Republic to introduce intra-Community surveillance in respect of imports of certain slippers and other indoor footwear and certain beach slippers originating in the People's Republic of China
(Only the French text is authentic)
(84/49/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In accordance with Article 2 of Decision 80/47/EEC, the French Republic is hereby authorized to establish, up until 31 December 1984, intra-Community surveillance of the products indicated below originating in the People's Republic of China and put into free circulation in the other Member States:
1.2.3 //   //   //   // CCT heading No  // NIMEXE code  // Description  //   //   //   // ex 64.04  // 64.04-10  // Slippers and other indoor footwear  // ex 64.04  // ex 64.04-90  // Beach slippers  // ex 64.02 B  // ex 64.02-69 1983, p. 12.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 January 1984.
For the Commission
Antonio GIOLITTI
Member of the Commission  // Beach slippers with rubber soles  //   //   //
